title: ЛАПТОП ASUS TUF GAMING A15 FA507NU-LP031 R7-7735HS/16GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 4050 6GB

features.Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS Mobile Processor (8-core/16-thread, 16MB L3 cache, up to 4.7 GHz max boost)
features.Wireless: Wi-Fi 6(802.11ax) (Dual band) 2*2 + Bluetooth 5.2 (*Bluetooth version may change with OS version different.)

1x Type C USB 4 support DisplayPort / G-SYNC
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C support DisplayPort / power delivery / G-SYNC
